data.eml:eml: Revision of the bryozoan genus Gephyrotes Norman, 1903 (Cheilostomata, Cribrilinidae) with the description of two new taxa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martino, Emanuela Di, Rosso, Antonietta (2015): Revision of the bryozoan genus Gephyrotes Norman, 1903 (Cheilostomata, Cribrilinidae) with the description of two new taxa. Zootaxa 3941 (2): 261-283, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.2.7
